[Property: host] = {'status': 'unchanged', 'value': 'hexlet.io'}
[Property: proxy] = {'status': 'removed', 'value': '123.234.53.22'}
[Property: timeout] = {'status': 'changed', 'old': 50, 'new': 20}
[Property: verbose] = {'status': 'added', 'value': True}
